subject: Basketball
Homosexuality
lead_paragraph: The former journeyman center John Amaechi has become the first N.B.A. player to acknowledge that he is gay, in an announcement made Wednesday in advance of his forthcoming book.
snippet: The former journeyman center John Amaechi has become the first N.B.A. player to acknowledge that he is gay, in an announcement made Wednesday in advance of his forthcoming book.
